stories.Title: SREday in London
stories.Description: This is your last chance to attend the leading SRE event of the month in London. SREday begins tomorrow. Don't miss the opportunity to witness over 50+ powerful talks. Buy your tickets now!
stories.Tweet: SREday in London 📦 This is your last chance to attend the leading SRE event of the month in London. SREday begins tomorrow. Don't miss the opportunity to witness over 50+ powerful talks. Buy your tickets now! #SRE https://sreday.com/?unpack

stories.Title: All with the right engineering
stories.Description: Highlighting the importance of aerodynamics and efficiency, Swiss students have achieved a remarkable feat with their hand-built electric car, Mythen, which has set a world record for acceleration.
stories.Tweet: All with the right engineering 📦 Highlighting the importance of aerodynamics and efficiency, Swiss students have achieved a remarkable feat with their hand-built electric car, Mythen, which has set a world record for acceleration. #EVs https://arstechnica.com/cars/2023/09/this-student-built-ev-just-set-a-new-world-record-for-0-62-mph/

stories.Title: Power to the people
stories.Description: BMW, Ford, and Honda are teaming up to form ChargeScape. This universal platform aims to simplify EV connectivity and grid management, boosting the electric market across North America.
stories.Tweet: Power to the people 📦 BMW, Ford, and Honda are teaming up to form ChargeScape. This universal platform aims to simplify EV connectivity and grid management, boosting the electric market across North America. #EVs https://electrek.co/2023/09/12/bmw-ford-honda-form-new-company-bolster-electrical-grid-ev-save-money/

stories.Title: Find the tune for your words
stories.Description: Stability AI's latest marvel is called Stable Audio. This model, trained on over 800,000 pieces of licensed music, makes it possible for you to create audio clips using only text descriptions.
stories.Tweet: Find the tune for your words 📦 Stability AI's latest marvel is called Stable Audio. This model, trained on over 800,000 pieces of licensed music, makes it possible for you to create audio clips using only text descriptions. #ai https://venturebeat.com/ai/stability-ai-debuts-stable-audio-bringing-text-to-audio-generation-to-the-masses/

stories.Title: Don't let the quiet fool you!
stories.Description: Apple's subtle AI approach may not steal the spotlight at keynotes. However, rest assured, AI is the magic behind the curtain in most of their products.

stories.Title: Unleash your creativity
stories.Description: Firefly, Adobe's AI tool, is officially out of beta. With the latest upgrades in Adobe's suite of apps, editing efficiency is about to soar.

stories.Title: AI in a can
stories.Description: The world's first AI-crafted soda is here! Coca-Cola's Y3000 Zero Sugar is a limited-edition beverage that blends human creativity and AI innovation.

stories.Title: Delivery directly from space
stories.Description: OSIRIS-REx is coming back to Earth, and it brings a cosmic souvenir. After a precision maneuver, the spacecraft is all set to drop an asteroid sample on September 24.

stories.Title: If you're looking for answers...
stories.Description: Curious minds are always seeking explanations about what lies beyond our world, and NASA's UFO study team is finally sharing some of them on September 14.

stories.Title: What made Apple switch to USB-C?
stories.Description: After sticking with the Lightning cable for years, Apple's iPhone 15 brings a major change; it is now part of USB-C's universal compatibility. There are several reasons behind this move.
stories.Tweet: What made Apple switch to USB-C? 📦 After sticking with the Lightning cable for years, Apple's iPhone 15 brings a major change; it is now part of USB-C's universal compatibility. There are several reasons behind this move. #apple https://apnews.com/article/apple-usbc-charging-cable-fac1df27b1297f4d4a526170e6ab1320

title: A record-breaking EV, Coca-Cola’s AI-generated soda, NASA’s UFO briefing
description: Swiss students have demonstrated that you only need the right touch of engineering and aerodynamics to break a world record. Coca-Cola is taking AI to a new place: beverages. Do you dare to taste futuristic flavors? Personally, I'm all for it. Lastly, on September 14 NASA's UFO study team is discussing a few of its findings. However, don't freak out just yet; the limited number of high-quality observations makes it impossible to draw any “extraterrestrial” conclusions.
